    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction of copper and sulphur under flame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion des Kupfers und des Schwefels unter 
Flamme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de cuivre et de soufre sous la flamme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação do cobre e do enxôfre sob a flama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione di rame e di zolfo sotto la fiamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση του χαλκού και του θείου κάτω από τη φλόγα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción del cobre y del sulfuro bajo la llama</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows copper and sulphur reacting together under flame to make copper sulphide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper sulphide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sulphur</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Kupfer und Schwefel, 
die zusammen unter Flamme reagieren, um kupfernes Sulfid zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le cuivre et le soufre 
réagissant ensemble sous la flamme pour préparer le sulfure de 
cuivre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o cobre e o enxôfre que
reagem junto sob a flama para fazer o sulphide de cobre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il rame e lo zolfo 
che reagiscono insieme sotto la fiamma per preparare il solfuro di 
rame.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το χαλκό και θείο που 
αντιδρούν μαζί κάτω από τη φλόγα για να κάνει το σουλφίδιο 
χαλκού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el cobre y el sulfuro 
que reaccionan junta bajo la llama para hacer el sulfuro de cobre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kupfer</string>
          </keyword>
